alert.note: Alert for Lamar; Marion (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 1:42AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Marion and northwestern Lamar Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 141 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Underwood-Petersville to 6 miles east of Pratts Friendship to near Pontotoc. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Hackleburg, Detroit, Brinn, Weston, Bear Creek, Henson Springs, Tessner, Shottsville, Rankin Fite Airport, Upper Bear Creek Reservoir, Byrd, Bexar, Pigeye and Marion County Public Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
